## Public API

#### Without API key

- https://api.sunrise-sunset.org/
- https://earthquake.usgs.gov/fdsnws/event/1/query?format=geojson&starttime=2020-01-01&endtime=2020-01-02
- https://api.coindesk.com/v1/bpi/currentprice.json
- https://dog.ceo/api/breeds/image/random
- https://api.ipify.org?format=json
- https://randomuser.me/api/
- http://www.7timer.info/bin/api.pl?lon=113.17&lat=23.09&product=civil&output=json
- https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts


#### With API key

- https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?lat=44.34&lon=10.99&appid={API_KEY}
